<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76687</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76687</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b29-9410-42f9-2c42-20a681c2242f#1#9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A művészettörténet eredete és tárgya</string>
            <string language="en">The origin and subject of art history</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Ursprung und das Thema der kunstgeschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'origine et le sujet de l'histoire d'art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A origem e o assunto do history da arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'origine e l'argomento di storia di arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προέλευση και το θέμα της ιστορίας τέχνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El origen y el tema de la historia del arte</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Miért beszélünk a műalkotásokról? Minek a története a művészettörténet? Tipológia</string>
            <string language="en">Why do we speak about work of arts? what does the history the art history of? typology</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">művészetelmélet,  művészet ágak,  szépművészet,  képzőművészet,  </string>
            <string language="en">art theory, branches of art, fine art, graphic art,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum sprechen wir über Kunstwerk? von was 
die Geschichte die kunstgeschichte? Typologie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi parlons-nous au sujet de l'oeuvre d'art ? 
de quoi l'histoire l'histoire d'art ? typologie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que nós falamos sobre o trabalho de artes? 
que  o history o history da arte? typology</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè parliamo di opera d'arte? di che 
cosa la storia la storia di arte? tipologia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί μιλάμε για το έργο των τεχνών; τι η 
ιστορία η ιστορία τέχνης; τυπολογία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué hablamos sobre la obra de arte? 
¿qué  la historia la historia del arte? tipología</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunsttheorie, Zweige der kunst, feine kunst, graphische 
kunst,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorie d'art, branchements d'art, art fin, l'industrie 
graphique,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teoria da arte, filiais da arte, arte fina, arte 
gráfica,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">teoria di arte, rami di arte, arte fine, arte grafica,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θεωρία τέχνης, κλάδοι της τέχνης, λεπτή τέχνη, γραφική 
τέχνη,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">teoría del arte, ramificaciones del arte, arte fino, 
arte gráfico,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76687</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
